name: intuition
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: (knowledge from) an ability to understand or know something immediately based on your feelings rather than facts

example.eg: Often there's no clear evidence one way or the other and you just have to base your judgment on intuition.
example.egtrans: 很多时候，往往没有这样或那样的确凿证据，你只得凭直觉进行判断。

example.eg: I can't explain how I knew - I just had an intuition that you'd been involved in an accident.
example.egtrans: 我无法解释我是如何知道的，我只是凭直觉感到你卷入了一场事故。
